title: Computer science will remain hard
context: There are two hard things in computer science -- cache invalidation, naming things, and off-by-one errors.
name: Jeff Atwood

title: Threat Hunting really will be driven by ML
context: Bit of a cliché but ML will no longer be something that you just buy. Tools & techniques that were previously the domain of data science experts are getting easier to use. Won’t be long before larger SOC teams are using the tools directly rather than via models that are embedded in products.
name: The Statesman

title: Attacks on APIs will increase in 2020
context: With connected devices today's IOT landscape becoming ubiquitous, companies need to be monitoring a broader attack surface area.
name: Jonathan Divincenzo

title: US IoT companies will be penalized for data and security violations
context: US based IoT vendors that sell in California but rely on foreign whitelabel IoT hardware and cloud services will increasingly be financially punshied for data and security violations under CCPA
name: Tod Beardsley
